issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: As of now *hadoop.ssl.enabled.protocols"* will not take effect for all the http servers( only Datanodehttp server will use this config).

I am not an expert in HttpServer area so please let me know if some of my comments doesn't make sense.

Overall the change looks good.
Have few comments.
+SslSelectChannelConnectorSecure.java+
* The list of enabled protocols from SSLEngine are {{SSLv2Hello, TLSv1, TLSv1.1, TLSv1.2}}.
After the change, we will filter out {{SSLv2Hello}}.
I think it should be ok.

*  {quote}
 +  private boolean contains(String p, String[] c) {
{quote}
Would be nice to use human readable variables instead of p and c.

Also it would be nice to have some supporting test cases.
